alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Valley; Prairie; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:37PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Garfield, Daniels, Roosevelt, Valley, Sheridan, western McCone and northwestern Prairie Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1032 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Bredette to 6 miles north of Cohagen. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. Another line of storms located to the east of Jordan is moving to the northeast at 25 mph and is converging or will eventually converge with the line of storms moving up from Bredette and Cohagen. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Wolf Point, Plentywood, Scobey, Poplar, Opheim, Richland, Nashua, Fort Peck, Medicine Lake, Froid, Westby, Flaxville, Duck Creek Rec Area, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Peerless, Hinsdale, Lustre, Port Of Scobey and Redstone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Valley; Prairie; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt
